unit: Unit 7 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Means
title: $t$-statistics and $p$-values
question_text:
From a set of $5\text{ observations}$, a matched pairs $t$-test was conducted using a one-sided (less than) alternative hypothesis.
If the $t$-statistic was $-0.83$, what was the $p$-value?

choices.text: The $p$-value cannot be determined from the information provided.
